reviews.review_msg: Jody keeps the lectures interesting and funalthough he does get off topic at times. He cares about the students and will help students to do their best in his course.

Jody is an amusing lecturer. He selects interesting, relevant media clips to enhance his lectures. He has tons of sources online. Probably don't need to go to class, but you'll want to because he is so engaging.Wish he taught upper divisions. Some say he is at times all-over-the-place with explanation of materials. I didn't find that to be true.
